Description.Text: Kitap Evi is a stylish 5-star hotel offering elegant accommodation near the heart of Bursa. Highlights include stunning interiors, excellent views, onsite dining, a garden terrace, Turkish bath and good transport links. Bursa is a beautiful and ancient city with a rich architectural and cultural heritage. It is known for its green spaces and neat urban layout. Places of interest include the Saltanat Kapi, Ulu Cami and Kapali Carsi. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Bursa destinations. The hotel occupies a traditional mid-rise property with wood detailing. Facilities include a Turkish bath and reading room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 17sqm and decorated in an elegant, individual style with dark-wood furniture and rich fabrics. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, satellite TV, a mini-bar and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The restaurant offers regional and international dishes in a charming and intimate setting, which features a fireplace and a terrace, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Free parking is possible nearby.
